articles.description: Former England manager Gareth Southgate has been awarded a knighthood in the New Year Honours list.
articles.title: New Year Honours 2025: Gareth Southgate is knighted

articles.description: Newcastle beat Manchester United in a league game at Old Trafford for only the second time since 1972 to condemn their hosts a third straight home loss in all competitions for the first time in more than 60 years.
articles.title: Manchester United 0-2 Newcastle United: Alexander Isak scores again as visitors claim dominant win

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Ipswich Town vs Chelsea in the Premier League
articles.title: Ipswich Town vs Chelsea: Premier League preview, team news, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler survives a massive scare but beats Ryan Joyce 4-3 to reach the quarter-finals of the PDC World Darts Championship.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Luke Littler survives scare to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Australia bowl India out for 155 in the fourth Test to take a 2-1 lead in the series with one match remaining.
articles.title: Australia v India: Hosts take series lead with win in Melbourne

articles.description: Emma Raducanu withdraws from this week's WTA event in Auckland because of a back problem.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: Briton withdraws from ASB Classic with back problem

articles.description: Ollie Watkins celebrates his 29th birthday with a goal and an assist but Aston Villa are held by Brighton in a hard-fought Premier League encounter.
articles.title: Aston Villa 2-2 Brighton: Ollie Watkins scores a goal and assists another in hard-fought draw

articles.description: Barcelona lose another appeal to register Spain midfielder Dani Olmo for the second half of the season, one day before the deadline.
articles.title: Dani Olmo: Barcelona lose another appeal to register Spain midfielder one day before deadline

articles.description: Referees will announce any video assistant referee decisions to fans inside stadiums for the first time during the upcoming Carabao Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Carabao Cup: Referees to announce VAR decisions to crowd in Arsenal-Newcastle and Spurs-Liverpool semi-finals

articles.description: AC Milan sack manager Paulo Fonseca following the draw against Roma in Serie A.
articles.title: AC Milan: Paulo Fonseca sacked as manager after draw against Roma
